productDescription.productBackpackDescription: carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.
productDescription.productBikeLightDescription: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.
productDescription.productBoltTshirtDescription: Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.
